item.title: 끝!
item.description:
안녕하세요

100가지 이상한 소리 100번을 끝으로 이제 전자음악 알아보기 블로그는 업데이트가 없을 예정 입니다. 2005년 2월 부터 지금까지 전자음악에 대한 글을 써 왔는데 이제 이곳에서 해야 할 말은 다 한 것 같아서 마무리를 지으려고 해요. 9년 이상 제 블로그를 봐 주시고 응원해 주셔서 감사합니다! 물론 전자음악 활동을 접는건 아니구요 계속 더 재밌고 신기한 소리를 다른 매체를 통해 들려 드리겠습니다. 앞으로 제 근황과 전자음악에 대한 이야기는 joowonpark.net 에 있는 블로그에 오시면 볼 수 있어요. 질문이나 궁금한 점도 joowon (달팽이) joowonpark.net 으로 이메일을 보내 주시거나 plus.google.com/+JooWonPark 에 올리면 성실히 답해 드리겠습니다.

박주원




tag : 끝, 안녕, 행복하세요
item.dc:creator: joowon

item.title: 100. 슈퍼콜라이더
item.description:
As for the last entry of 100 Strange Sounds, I want to show the main audio program I used for the project. SuperCollider is free and available for PC, Mac, and Linux.  Download the program at 

http://www.audiosynth.com

For the patch I have used for this entry and a few others, please download the instruction and the patch at:

http://www.joowonpark.net/Toccata.pdf

For more information, please visit:
http://www.joowonpark.net
http://www.100strangesounds.com


tag : 100, 100가지이상한소리
item.dc:creator: joowon

item.title: 99. 탈모
item.description:
탈모에 대한 노이즈음악 입니다.

 

I recently noticed that I have much less hair than a few years ago. I am not sad about it, but I thought I should make a piece  about it. I used no-input mixer, electromagnetic pickup, analog synthesizer, and dancing toy cat for the piece. 

Receding Hairline is a showcase of the new instruments I have leaned to play in the past two years. Here are the relevant pieces that showcases each instrument.

Gums for no-input mixer
http://youtu.be/DNx2m9Y4Weo

100 Strange Sounds No. 83 - Synth
http://youtu.be/FuB6Xs2eldE

100 Strange Sounds No. 63 - Smartphone on electromagnetic pickup
http://youtu.be/QtdWBvvgH-I

Similar setup, but played in duo
http://youtu.be/yT5ZpuqezaY

Soundcloud version:
https://soundcloud.com/joowon/receding-hairline
Sorry, no other pieces use the dancing cat.


tag : 탈모음악, 전자음악, 노이즈음악
item.dc:creator: joowon

item.title: 98. Altoids Tin
item.description:
깡통에 고무줄을 걸면 재밌는 소리가 난답니다.

Materials used : Altoids Tin, rubber bands, electric guitar pickup, quarter coin, Macbook running SuperCollider

How it was made : I attached the electric guitar pickup to an Altoids Tin. The tin box is a good resonator and transmits sounds very well. The sound of the rubber band on Altoids tin was processed in realtime with SuperCollider. 




tag : 깡통소리, altoids, altoidsproject
item.dc:creator: joowon

item.title: 앨범: Side Dish Side Affect
item.description:
오늘 Charles Shriner와 같이 작업한 Side Dish Side Affect 라는 앨범을 발매 했습니다. 많이 들어 주세요!

Side Dish Side Affect by Joo Won Park & dRachEmUsiK

Side Dish Side Affect is an electroacoustic duo consisting of Joo Won Park (joowonpark.net) and Charles Shriner aka dRachEmUsiK (charlesshriner.com).  Both Charles and Joo Won like strange sounds and good food. The tracks were named after Korean side dishes. Some of these dishes sound a little exotic, but they taste great… once you get used to it. 
credits
released 01 May 2014 
Charles: Electronic Wind Instrument. MarSynth Morris Box, Morris Box 2 and WSB-b. Voice, various controllers, soft-synths, processing. 

Joo Won: kalimba, melodica, no-input mixer, slinky, squeaky toys, electronic toothbrush, chain, egg shaker, piece of wood, rubber band, coin, plastic card, chatter teeth, windup toys, music box, recorder, coin, SuperCollider on Mac, no-input mixer 

All tracks in this album were performed and recorded live on October 5th, 2013 at MCSD Studio in Indianapolis, IN. 

Copyright 2014 Joo Won Park, Charles Shriner. Creative Commons Licensed BY-NC



tag : 앨범, 전자음악, 듀오, 실험음악

item.title: 97. 장난감 아코디언
item.description:
Sounds of a toy accordion is processed and manipulated in realtime with SuperCollider on Mac. 
Materials Used: Woodstock Toy Accordion, AKG C3000 Condenser Mic

item.title: 94. 소리굽쇠
item.description:
Materials Used: Tuning forks (3 different pitches), AKG C1000 condenser mic, Audix f9 condenser mic, SuperCollider on Macbook Pro.

How it was made: The sound of the tuning forks are being processed by AM synthesis. The frequency of the processed sound changes when microphones pickup loud sound. 

by Joo Won Park
http://www.100strangesounds.com 



tag : 소리굽쇠, 소리굽쇠음악

item.description:
A bathtub with a rubber ducky. C1000 condenser microphone, & SuperCollider processing the draining sound in realtime.
